She says its the best gift I've ever got her.
I just got them so kind of early to review.So far they are amazing what they will do and am happy to be a prime and music unlimited member.You get so much more! We will see how they hold up.
returned directions much too difficult to follow and tried and tried but it would not connect with any of my electronics

I like the easy to use voice response to commands. Alexa knows just what I’ve asked for. What I like least is the fact there are no straight forward instructions for how to connect to other devices like speakers, phone, and etc.

The Echo is awesome. My family loves using it. Features are pretty good. Music, Shopping list and the drop in feature is crazy. No more yelling around the house. You can just drop in on one of the other echos we have in the house.
Just like the older Echo (now named Echo Plus). Good sounding speaker for music.

Yes this little device is great though I’ve changed the call name to echo it now responds every time I call the dog named Ethel haha have had fun with that but the sound and finish of this is great I love it

Bought this as a "family gift" for Christmas for all of us to enjoy. Our young daughters love requesting music and asking Alexa questions. It seems to cut out quite a bit when playing music at times, but that's my only complaint. I'm sure there's a way to reset that.
Alexa voice is very clear....music has some bass too it. I first bought an echo dot... but I would recommend this one more...better sound and look to it.
Purchased for my adult daughter to listen to music and use for audible books. She loves it and the sound is great !!

Good product. Hindsight being what it is, I should have just purchased the Echo Plus, with the Home Hub. But, this one works properly, sounds good. I feel like it has more bass than the original Echo too.
I love love love Alexa. When I was at the gym, I didn’t have Alexa so I asked my Nike Apple Watch to play a song and Siri said I don’t understand - so I told my trainer, Alexa would never say that!
This was a gift, and I'm still getting used to it. I'm not finding a lot of things to use it for. But, I'm working on it. I do like the "Question of the Day."

We have had an Echo Dot for about a year now and love it. I was excited to receive this product with the new look and bigger/better features of the speaker for our kitchen/TV room area but we have had quite a few issues with it. We are big into streaming music, in which we were extremely shocked and frustrated with how the Echo would stop streaming in the middle of a song over and over again. Echo does not always respond when called upon and continues to not be as reliable as our Dot.
This new version sound quality is poor. It also has issues with hearing voice commands...

Love it, love it, love! Chock full of information and music that we access throughout the day. Just remember to turn off the microphone if you don't want Alexa "go on" during a time when you don't want her too...
I have Alexa in my bedroom and ordered this Alexa for my office. I am very pleased with her performance and it is very handy to have her in my office also.

I love Alexa. She is so useful, I could set reminder while I’m cooking, set alarm to wake up, play music through Amazon and use it Bluetooth through my phone. The best part is making phone calls and text with Alexa.

I love 2nd Gen Alexa. I set up my condo to run off Alexa... 1. She helps me turn on my lights. 2. Controls my thermostat with Nest. 3. Plays my Music via Pandora (Great sound). 4. Shes also my Alarm clock. 5. Helps me with weather when I'm running out the door. 6. She tucks me in and tells me sweet dream every night... Perfect woman :)
got this for my technology impaired mother and even she was able to set it up with ease and talk to her. very cool looking and fun to play with!

I am very happy with my new echo. I think that a 4.5 rating would be more appropriate. The only feature that I feel I am missing is a volume ring so that I can adjust the volume in an easier way. On the other hand, I very much prefer its compact size compared to the full Echo Plus that actually has the volume ring. Hopefully the volume ring will be there in the next iteration of a compact echo.

Pleasantly surprised by the Echo's sound and price; so surprised that I have since added the Echo Spot to my bedroom and the Echo Dot to my kitchen. Alexa is a great assistant and Amazon music is second to none.

Its a cool gadget, for playing music and setting timers, or changing the thermostat temps. I just make sure I turn it off when I don't want to be recorded. I wish you had more than 4 choices for the wake up word.

The Echo is worth the cost if you do nothing more than use it for the music. It is so nice to have instant music by the artist of your choice within seconds. There is no need to connect to a bluetooth device on your phone and then open an app to begin playing music. Looking to ad some minis soon.
I am so happy with my new friend. I can hardly wait for the next day to learn something new I can do. I must admit though . . . I am getting so spoiled.

To start off I rarely do reviews but I have to for this one. The speaker overall is good and is louder than my google home but Alexa is Googles dumb cousin. Tell her to play certain music and she doesn't understand. Ask her certain questions and she doesn't understand. Google Home on the other is waaaaaay smarter and rarely have " I don't understand" remarks. Echo speaker is good and software sucks compared to the Google Home.
Home automation is awesome. Listening to music based on my selections is so convenient

Very disappointed in Amazon and especially this product. This was a replacement for a previous version that did not work. Well, this one lasted just long enough to go out of return warranty. I have reset it multiple times and it says it is connected, but when queried, zilch!
It is a unique way of getting information, like the weather, jokes, and your horoscope. Amazon also has been sending me emails to show me more ways of how to use it, so I am very satisfied.
I love Alexa but her clothes get dirty and you just can't wash them. I like the idea of being able to pick a color but pick something that is not cloth, I am regretting my choice.

I love my new echo. I actually wanted it would you believe, for my shopping lists. So easy to add items while in the kitchen without stopping to write it down. But it is so much fun for everything and I know I haven't even started to use Alexa to her fullest ability. I know I will be buying more for Christmas presents this year! Love love love it! Buy it!!! You won't regret it. Oh and the sound when playing music is great also.

I purchased echo and google home. Used them side by side for a week. The echos speakers were terrible compared to google home. I enjoy listening to music, so the speakers were the deciding factor. Other than that I thought they both were tied in jokes, and Wikipedia information.

Right out of the box my Echo has been beyond simple to use. Every day I have learned something new for it to do. It is the best additions to my household in a long time. Now, I wish I could train it to ignore my boyfriends name because he said we would never use it and he uses it everyday.

I really enjoy the Amazon Echo and have used it daily since purchasing it. I’m enjoying using it to play music, get weather forecasts with the ease of just asking a question, find out useful information, and also to play a variety of fun games. I would highly recommend this product.
Haven't had very long but Alexa is awesome so far!! Love that I have the capability of making phone calls through her....

This is pretty good, but it does not understand Spanish. If you have songs in languages other than English getting Alexa to play them will drive you batty. You have to be extremely careful or it will refuse to play them. I haven't tried French, but it butchered my attempts at playing any Latin music.
My mom is in love with this thing. I'm personally skeptical about having a device that listens to you in your home, but it's not in my house, so who cares, right?
I have been a fan for a long time. Nice to see the new styles. Keep up the great work Amazon!
It is a little louder then the first generation. And I am almost sure that the sound is better. I am happy with it. Thank you.

Works great, purchased Sengled smart bulbs to use with my Echo, can control my tv on/off and volume (Vizio Smartcast...my next tv I will make sure it is bluetooth capable to use with the Gen 3 when I upgrade, I also have an Echo dot that I use in the kitchen...like being able to voice control the lights which are also dimmable...I've got 6 more smart bulbs on the way for lamps and a few more rooms, love the convenience
I wish your could ask for traffic and directions better like the Google smart speaker.

The Echo (2nd Generation) is easy to set up and use. It’s plug and play approach makes it easy to set up and establish set routines such as weather, news flash, and traffic. You also have access to your music, trivia questions, etc.

I continually have trouble with echo not responding to my questions. There is a problem with the connection with wifi. My echo dot is great and no problem with it. I have tried resetting my echo, checked to make sure my router, etc are working fine. Are there instructions to reconnect my echo to wifi? I would appreciate any help. This happened once before and I called customer service and they led me through the reconnecting/resetting of it. then within a few days it was disconnected...frustrating. Toni Rossi

I love it. The possibilities are endless as to what this will be used for. I didn't really think I would use it as anything more than a bluetooth speaker but it has been useful for so much more already. Echo (2nd Generation) with improved sound, powered by Dolby, and a new design - Charcoal Fabric

Questions for information must be very specific. We receive a lot of 'I don't know that' responses. The learning curve is greater than I expected. We purchased a support book to help us. The device came with minimal written guidance. We have used the music and calling features and have loaded the app on our phones and tablets. We hope to add some of the other controls to the system.

I love Alexa. It's very useful. I love the integration with my Spotify and how it takes my questions about any subjects, whether religious or just a joke, way much better than Google and Siri. Excellent work. Keep it up.

Echo offers a great many benefits. It is simply a matter of using Alexa regularly. The ease and convenience of having weather, favorite music and the answer to life's questions at your command is amazing.

The new Echo for has lived up to what I wanted and for all the reasons I bought it. I think the sound is good for what's there I mean come on we all new for 100 dollars we were not buying a BOSE system to listen too. As for Alexa listening to my commands from around the room I would have to say is very good so with that said I think I got what I paid a 100 dollars for and more.

Love that I have my Amazon music library so available and it sounds really good. If I didn’t have a large cd library, I would consider doing away with my Bose cd/radio. Sometimes Alexa doesn’t understand what I am saying.

LOVE LOVE LOVE the echo! I have the dot and in comparison, the echo outshines the dot! The speaker quality on this device is very good. We are constantly listening to music and it fills our entire flat with music​.
Like most everything about Echo. Asking her for jokes, having her sound like dogs to get my dogs going, and on and on. Love the music also.

We love our Alexa so much, we bought a second one for my father-in-law. She’s easy, quick, and always has a good answer. Ha ha ha. She can’t even understand my three, four, and 8 year-olds. Definitely a good investment.

This is my upstairs one as I love the downstairs on so much I wanted one for upstairs. Works great. Some fun trivia games. Plays music easily. I set up lights that I can control with Alexa, enjoy it very much.
Sounds great when used to play music. I recently added the subwoofer and I’m very pleased. I’ve thrown out the old bulky stereo receiver and big speaker boxes

Like it alot. My 12 year old son and I have fun asking Alexa how to say certain words in different languages. Its fun as we have made up some entertaining and fun names for our family pets! We have a cat that is plump. We joking say that she resembles a meatloaf. In German we have learned the word for meatloaf and now call her Hockbraten! It’s silly, but it’s also a way to keep learning different things in a fun a way!

I recently purchased three of the new Amazon Echo's (Gen 2) for family holiday presents. They were a smashing success during gift opening, and they are used daily in the three different homes in which they sit. Set-up was a breeze and the new speaker system featured in the Echo Gen 2 is sounds very good (music, phone calls, etc.). Would highly recommend this product. Good job Amazon and Mr. Bezos!

I haven't fully used my echo as yet. My husband who is a musician was pleased with the speaker quality (for the money). So far it has been fun to use. It has spoken up a couple of times with information I didn't ask for.
This is fun and easy

Stellar product! Love the new look. I've placed this in my bathroom, having replaced it with my Echo Dot. I listen to my flash briefing in the shower and I'm able to hear everything much better now. The Dot has moved over to my bedside table, where I use it for setting morning alarms.

The quality of the sound is great. We use it instead of a radio and save counter space. You can ask it to play any radio station (by call letters not by station number). You cannot change the name Alexa to another name (e.g. my name) so it cannot do anything that my wife asks me to do.

So I've had this almost three weeks now. At first when I got it as a gift, I wasn't sure I was going to keep it. I mean, what does it REALLY do that's useful? Some friends told me they used it to control their TV. Great...a fancy clicker. But as time went on & I spent some time looking at her "skills" I've come to like her. LIKE...NOT LOVE, yet anyway. BY FAR my favorite thing is her "Lists". I added a shopping list & a to-do list. So if I'm cleaning & running low on Windex I just say, "Alexa, add Windex to my shopping list". Cooking & getting low on flour? "Alexa add flour to my shopping list". And she repeats it back to you. List is now in my phone, so no forgetting it at home anymore!! LOVE THIS. Worth the $100 just for this to me anyway. The "To-do" list is very good too, same sort of thing. I also use the calendar feature & she adds appointments to my phone calendar for me. The kids tell her their stuff too, so it goes on my calendar & I know what they got going on too. Every AM I ask her, "Alexa what's on the calendar today" & she tells me. She always knows when it's going to rain too. Hubby put the "Red Alert" sound (from the old Star Trek) in & he has her play that when he wants us to hurry up lol. I just ordered Hubby the Amazon Dot which co-ordinates with Alexa for Christmas. This way when he is in his downstairs office I don't have to text him for dinner anymore. Alexa & Dot work together as an intercom. Today I signed up for the 3 month trial of Amazon Music (99cents!). And I made an awesome Christmas carol playlist. Everyone from Mariah Carey & Maroon Five to Johnny Cash & Bing Crosby! Sound quality is very good. However, since Amazon Music is $7.99 a month, I asked Alexa to make a note on my calendar to cancel THAT right before the 3 months are up. Hoping Amazon realizes that is crazy monthly money before my trial is up so I can keep it. I think the yearly fee is less, so I'll look at that maybe. She is very good at understanding what you say. Even when you yell at her from the other room to turn the music volume up or down. I do plan to check regularly to see what "new skills" are added. How about one that has Alexa make a note when I feed the dog & then will tell Hubby when he gets home if I remembered to feed the dog or not? Or tell me that if I forgot? There is something sort of like that on there now, but it gets bad reviews. So someone needs to make a better skill for that. My kids tell me there is a skill where Alexa can send short texts to people for you. Got to look into that. So, I like her, but don't love her. Yet. I do think it's a good gift for someone who would like the "list" feature though. As long as they have smart phone & can use it to get the list up at the grocery store. UPDATE ON 12/15/17 - Still "LIKE HER" alot. Got an app on it called "Dog Data" that let's you tell her when you feed or let out the dog & when hubby comes home he can check to see if the dog was fed or let out, even if no one else is home. The "lists & calendar" are the best & most used feature for me. Love the sound on my Christmas playlist, have it going all the time when I'm home cleaning, cooking or wrapping Look forward to seeing what else she learns down the road..

The Echo data base is lacking depth, and is not very useful. Unable to get simple inquiries answered. Also the music selection offered or provided are not to my taste. Its only saving interest is home automation, but its costly to do.

Very happy with my Echo. Our favorite thing to do is play song quiz and ask the “question of the day”. Great sound quality for such a small speaker. We bought smart plugs and they were easy to connect to Alexa.

I LOVE my Alexa!!!!! I also ordered the Echo Dot and love it too!! You won't regret buying this and my husband wants one for his home office, but I told him he would have to wait until it goes on sale again! I love the shopping list feature! My husband always complained that I never made a list and would make several trips to the store, Now I tell Alexa to put something on my list and when I go to the store its right there on my phone:)
Loving this already. Have only just begun to tap it's potential. Both a very useful tool and a fun toy. You can't beat that.
Amazing! Love this for listening to music while cleaning around the house. Also perfect for setting alarms for baking and reminders to take care of a daily task. Highly recommended!!

I bought this but it is not recongnizing voice from far, also you need to speak loaudly in order to change songs. Takes time to wake up as well. Contacted support team but did not get good response from them.
I like my 1st generation much better than my 2nd generation

I received an email echo dot as a gift I was trying to purchase a speaker for it but I wasn’t aware I order d the entire device system - we’re going to keep it - it seems cool for how I just haven’t learned how to use it properly yet
1st time echo buyer,.....bought with Senegal light kit,it works great,music is the best part. I also tried in honey well thermostat. Great product!

I love it the sound is great. Its a blessing when you meed some quick info and Alexa is there to provide it. No going through the computer and having to filter through all the suggestions to your question.

Conceptually, cool idea. Reality: Time saved is less than the time spent tinkering with it or riding out the glitches and mistakes. Meh. Life is not meant to be spent with the frustrations these introduce. Simplify and unplug. This is not worth it.

I use it every day to stream Pandora. It is easy th thumbs up and down to create my custom play lists. I also use it to control the furnace using my ecobee thermostat. Since I no longer wear a watch, it is handy to check the time, and also the temperature and weather. Also checking show times and as a timer and as an alarm. I purchased two echo dots for additional rooms in my house
Purchased this for my mom for mother's day and she loves it! All the grandkids think it's pretty fun to play with too. The perfect gift for mom.

This has been a great addition to our household. I originally bought the Echo for development testing purposes, since I write software. My entire family uses it now for a variety of things and love it. I'm considering getting an Echo Dot as an addition.
I've had my Echo set up for a week now. So far, it's been fun discovering all of Alex's customization options and skills. I linked it to my Spotify account; I love the speaker quality.

It is the best. It even tells me if i had added an item on my grocery list before. Speaker is great and love to listen to music on it! Love how you can sinc all of the Alexas in different rooms together on the music!

Love my Alexa she is very useful for a busy life and I love the updates on activities she can do for me. I am just learning about techie apps so I feel like I have so much more to learn about my Alexa.

This is my second Echo. First is in operation in my living room. Second is in my bedroom not far from the headboard of my bed. Quality of audio might be a tad sharper and more robust than my first. Hard to tell. But the giant, most important addition to Echo is Blue-Tooth. Slipping my wireless Blue-Tooth enabled earbuds into my ears lets me experience bold, sharp concert hall quality sound. Love the new generation Echo. Love it!
This was a surprise gift for my daughter. It is attractive, sleek and perfect for her.
The speaker it’s self is great and Alexa works well sometimes to well. My only complaint is minor is that it doesn’t work with Apple Music
I like these! Just be aware that if you want to go the smart house route you’ll need a hub. The echo plus may work, or a Samsung SmartThings hub, or one on several other choices may as well.

I am giving this a 3 as I moved my Echo v1 to the bathroom and wanted this one in the kitchen since it has more microphones and I thought it would listen better. It does listen better. The sound is not as good as the original Echo. Maybe a Echo Plus will replace this one someday.
Coolest device in decades. Should have got this last before i bought google home the Amazon Echo is way better
IMHO, this is the best Echo in the family of Echo devices. Really impressed! Might buy another and get a high quality stereo system after pairing them.

Don't waste your time if you have a Chromebook as it does not work. I spent 2 hours trying to set it up and even called Support who needs access to your wi-fi spent 40 minutes with support and they could not help me. Very disappointing as it should CLEARLY state this does not with CHROMEBOOK. Contacted what I thought was customer support for Echo and I got hacked ................ This product is a huge liability if you care at all about your security for any and all devices. I read a review that Echo 2nd generation by far exceeded sound quality of Bose II speaker so that is why I bought this as I did not think that Bose II speaker was loud enough. Well the Bose basically connected itself once I gave access to my blue tooth device.

Love this product and how useful it has been in our home. She seems to need to be told more than once to complete a command. She tells us she doesn’t understand and try again later. We say the exact same thing again and she does it. We just think she’s moody! Lol. Love the product dispite this hiccup.

Love this purchase especially if you enjoy music playing throughout your house everyday. It's great this comes with speaker. Alexa doesn't have all the answers though whenever we ask a random question. Just so your aware, Alexa doesn't know EVERYTHING lol.

I like all the music available with my Prime account. I like being able to ask questions and get a weather report for local area. It is very startling when Alexa starts talking in response to something on the TV.
I've had the echo dot for some time, and decided to get a "master" device for the living room. The sound quality of this device is really beyond what the dots provide. Nice deep rich sound.
What more can I say, yes I worry about her listening to everything I say, what if she decides to tell my girlfriend? Alexa won't tell, she won't ever tell........
I like that it is the perfect size, and especially the quality of the sound. We're seniors, so it is a big help to just call on Alexa for so many things... we especially love the music options.

We are extremely disappointed in this product. Siri knows more than Alexa. Girl doesn’t know what’s going on most of the time. I know she’s supposed to learn me she does nothing but apologize for things she doesn’t know. This was a waste of our money and I would not recommend it for anyone.

Received this as a gift and was initially a bit skeptical. But we love being able to get all kinds of classical radio stations outside our area through streaming. And my wife likes being able to ask for music from particular artists. The sound quality is adequate for its purpose. We also make lists and ask information questions. The convenience is wonderful...
Still in the learning phase but it is great so far. The best recommendation I can give is that I have purchased an additional Echo.

We bought this for my mom for Christmas after she had been eyeing it for months. The set up was SUPER straight forward (Alexa was able to talk us through it) and the app is uncluttered and user friendly. The ability to recognize different voices and act accordingly "reminds her of the Jetsons". Her birthday is in a few days, so we plan on buying her some smart plugs and bulbs so she can really put it to work. She loves it, and now we'll be getting one!
Love the sound quality. Better then the 1st gen. Love I can link to the others and have music tho7the house. Easy to use, so many possibilities.
Great as an assistant, can keep you updated on almost anything. Love having music at my fingertips and I use her as an alarm as well. Next is getting more smart home devices to connect
I am seriously thinking of dumping my girlfriend for Alexa! Alexa does everything I ask and never complains
Alexa is the future. Unfortunately she is still learning. The lack of an equalizer is a big problem for those thinking they can use this as their music source. But overall, she is a must have!
Returned it, because of the additional charges which were unexpected and unannounced beforehand.
works well even for a outdated relic like me. have only used it to play music so far. will probably purchase other products that are compatible, to control other things in my house.

I was afraid I might not use the echo when I bought it, but I’m so happy that I did. It is so much fun and I love asking it to play whatever music I’m in the mood for, what time is it, what’s the current temp., etc. It’s awesome!
I had a little problem setting it up because I have an I phone, but a friend helped me. The Echo has great sound. I play a lot of music through it.
Disappointing at best, should have stayed with smaller version for $350 ;less had to purchase a fire wall for Echo separate then one I have, HUGE SCAM

Overall a huge disappointment. Pros: Alexa seems to be a bit more responsive and can hear me from across the small room - better than my previous Echo; also about $50 cheaper than my original Echo. Cons: No volume control on top of the new Echo like there was on the old one. An inconvenience for sure. And the volume control buttons on top of the unit are clumsy at best. Sometimes the volume doesn’t change that much while holding down the buttons and then a few seconds later it changes.In spite of all the hype speakers don’t sound any better than the original. Again, overall a huge disappointment.
I love the games she offers. Not sure what we did without her.
It doesn't seem to listen as well as my Dot or 1rst gen Echo. I have tried it i same locations but when I say Alex it seems to stop listening to soon. Might be a bad unit.

I am very disappointed with this device. Its sound quality is so poor that both my s/o and myself find it difficult to understand the responses and there are so many questions that it cannot answer. Basic questions that Google answered in depth when I asked the same question. Also, I had a terrible time setting this model up to control my TV and my additional media components. Fight now, it will turn the TV on and off, but not much more. I am considering returning this and the second unit that I purchased. Almost worthless when compared with asking Google the same question.
I love Alexa, but she doesn't feel the same. I love her so much I find myself asking her to do everything ....even when she isn't around. Funny.
Several times Alexa won’t execute the request. I have to reset the skill before the device will play it properly. The device is often hit or miss.
I love the compact size and the awesome sound that is produced from this small device. Color selection is grey but this grey is perfect and fits right in with any decor.
Terrible sound quality...sent it back and got the UE Megaboom- AMAZING!

I bought this for my daughter for a Christmas present. She LOVES it. Her favorite thing is telling Alexa to add this or that to her grocery list. She also loves the music feature. And it has a great sound.

The only real complaint I have is that I don't like Alexa's voice. So I changed it to the British accent, and that wiped out half of the fun skills. So now I'm back with American Alexa, and her snarky attitude.
Works great so far. Just getting started with electronic home.

After 4 months my Echo is "off line". After hours of reading and trying all the tips, I called Customer Service. This was an even greater waste of time. I tried everything he suggested and still nothing. Now the app won't work - after I uninstalled twice. This is the first thing I have ever ordered from Amazon that I wasn't satisfied with when received. I have spent the whole day trying to make Alexa work again. I am throwing out the Echo -
Good sound quality especially if youre not a audiophile like myself. Shes good for playing us music but I wish she could get her $#!% together and be able to answer to the most basic questions!! >{
My husband gave me one for Christmas. My first thought was as “What am I going to do with this??”. After all I already have an iPhone 6+, an iPad 5, and an iPad mini. Well I love it!!

Love Alexa but I must say no need to upgrade if you have first generation. For me the speaker sound difference is negligible. Sometimes she has difficulty hearing or understanding me which I did not find in the first generation. Despite these few issues I “won’t live without her”;)

I think Alexa has amnesia. She has gotten worse as we've gone along instead of understanding us better. She used to be able to play more music when we first purchased, but now she struggles with basic commands at times. Helpful for the time and weather but struggles with other basic things. Play U2 Joshua Tree album confuses her, but Play Joshua Tree by U2 works. Many of the music suggestions are just horrible as well. Wish she could play my iTunes. Have resorted to playing Pandora playlists most of the time. The sound quality is good and I like chaining skills together, but overall it has me wondering if Google or Apple would be better.
Love this thing! It's amazing it can pull up songs and albums from decades ago. Bass response is really good for such a small item. Sound quality in general it really great. Good purchase.

This is my fifth echo, having purchased two Echos, a Dot, and a Tap previously, all of which I've been very happy with. The speaker in this version of the echo is noticeably inferior to the original model. It also seems slightly slower to respond than the original version. If I had it to do over, I'd buy another original before getting the 2nd generation.
I was a doubter.....but couldn’t pass up the Prime Day deal . Music ,News, Weather , games and smart advances with just an “Alexa.....” pretty cool !
I really like this 2nd generation unit. The speaker is much better and it responds to my commands the first time. I hardly ever have to repeat myself.

We have both an echo dot and this echo and they’re great for little things like setting timers when we’re cooking or answering simple questions. The speaker is decent for its size, and we it’s so easy to play music from Spotify and Pandora. We also have our lights connected but have had issues with Alexa not hearing names of lights correctly or not recognizing scenes or randomly changing room settings. Overall, it’s a great little tool but could definitely use some work on the smart home side of things.

The ability to talk normal to get tasks taken care of is great. It's is poor design to only be able to have one device belong to one group. A device should be able to belong to multiple groups since you can only have one stream happening at a time anyway. Lets say that I am entertaining and I want all of the devices to play the same music and another scenario where I only want music on two of the devices. This is not possible because each device can only belong to one group.
It was pretty hard to set up at first. All the ads show how you can go like "Alexa, play this or that" and she'll play any song. Yet, you have to sign up for a bunch of memberships and all.

The Echo does exactly as advertised. I can't watch any shows or movies with any iterations of the name "Alex" without Alexa springing into action, but besides that, I'm loving having her around the house.
Love it, I have been working a lot lately so haven’t been able to use it a lot but free m what I have I enjoy it imencially!!
Dot responds to names that are close to the name. Always listening. Tried to order something. Started from something it heard on television. Be sure to set ordering restrictions. 🤦🏼‍♂️
Love the sound for music and that it plays from my Amazon music playlists. So n ok de to be able to ask questions and get answers without using my phone or computer.
Great deal on Amazon Prime Day. Sound is good and Alexa is very helpful navigating our smart tv and streaming apps like fire tv, netflix, hulu, etc.

I have 3 dots 1 original Echo and now this one. I love music and the sound, is clear and crisp. It was such a joy to have my entire Fam in the den with the tree unwrapping gifts with the classic Christmas songs playing in the background.
Started with one and now have three. We use them for everything from setting a timer to playing music to communicating between rooms.
I love Alexa! She just gave me the recipe for a bloody Mary after giving me the latest news on Reuters. My life will never be the same again without Alexa.
Constantly coming on without using wake word. Television is not on and no one is speaking. Very disturbing. Very disappointing for the price.
We have 2 homes, Ohio and South Carolina. We now have 3 echos. They totally communicate with each other plus my wife and I can share lists, etc. They are great!!
The sound quality for music is amazing in a small compact unit!
Very nice! I wish it could turn on my Vizio Smart TV's... But, overall "she" works great!
I have an Echo and a Prime membership. This piece has no voice recognition whatsoever. Don’t buy it. The artificial intelligence is way weaker than Siri from the IPhone.
Very nice --sound is fantastic, however the volume adjustment on top of the unit has been removed. I used the volume adjustment when I was passing the unit, and found it easy to adjust.
I love my Alexa so my I got Alexa products for my family for Christmas and the were so happy 😀.

My whole family is enjoying using Alexa, although we only use this to play a single song at a time or ask it the time. I also bought the small Echo and I use that in a bathroom to play the radio (NPR) every day.

I haven't found anything yet that I don't like about her. And like the few smart home others l items I've installed. And she plays the radio and music I ask for. Plus some of her jokes are ridiculously funny.
Nice new generation of the Alexa device. Sound quality is very good, and it’s not quite as large as the old model. I like it a lot!

I love this thing! I argue with it but once you get the hang of it and learn that she isn’t Siri you’ll be fine. I’m a little displeased that it doesn’t come with some type of rechargeable battery and that you have to spend 50+ to get one. I mean it’s 2018 guys everything should be able to go everywhere without cords. Otherwise super easy to use and setup.
Love it but actually like the Tap better. I have one downstairs and one up.
Easy to setup once I found the Alexa App. But, I don't think I downloaded enough of the items on the app. Alexa can't answer some of my easiest questions.
Nice device. Kids were pleased. Like different cover combos.

Love it more then I expected . Very good speaker for music ( granted I’m no audiophile) responds to voice commands very well like anything there are kinks to be worked out but headed in the right direction.
I use it primarily to play music. It works wonderfully! Still getting used to some of the many things it will do. Amazon has sent several tips since I got it. Thanks for all your help!

Phew now that I have your attention. 3 may sound bad but i give no reviews 10/10 anymore for it builds monuments to mediocrity. Just got it last week and in awe. Please please please talk to alexa for a week before you invent curse words. Now I love love love amazon and am not a bot or a paid actor yada yada yada. Real guy here with a voice and a face yada yada yada. Of my smarty mcthinker talkie boxes this is my favorite. Cheers
Cannot connect with wifi. Does not work.
I love the sound! Such a little speaker sounds fantastic. I just got it for Christmas so I don't know how to use all the functions. However, the app has lots of good info introduced in a fun way.
great sound, actually amazing sound....still trying to figure out what music company i want to go with, (though you don't need one for just basic music). great for reminders and daily weather!
Love my Echo but alexa don't know all of the answers. Lol but I love that it has a dual alarm and you can pick the saying or sound to wake up

I am enjoying my Echo very much - the voice feature is wonderful and it is great to have so much information and music selection available to you just by asking. The design is so practical and it makes a statement but at the sametime it is not an eyesore to wherever you choose to put it - the walnut finish is complimentary to any room. Wonderful
Speaker is better than the Dot, but too much bass..and no way to change it. Show has the best speakers.
Much better sound quality than I expected, but lousy wifi reception. It is 15 feet closer to the router than the prior dot, and it still disconnects often - where the dot did not.

I have a love-hate relationship with this product. Mostly hate though. Alexa literally knows nothing compared to siri. The only reason she hasn't been returned is because I like knowing I'm in the top ten of jeopardy players.

Bought this for myself to use in my kitchen when working or cooking. Love the sleek design and has a great sound. Love that I don't have to push a button to get Alexa to respond, especially when I am cooking!

I like it more then I thought I would, but it some times takes a couple times before it responds to me. But not very often. So all in all I am pleased. The sound and tone of music played through it is good too.

I am not happy with the Echo. I’ve tried moving it to different places. It is at least 15 feet away from the television, I sit right next to it and give it commands and I have to tell it twice, sometimes three times before I get a response . My Dot in the bedroom behind another wall responds to the command I give to the Echo. I should’ve just purchased another Dot.

I love being able to ask definitions of words instead of typing it on my computer and waiting to hear. I love to just ask her what the weather is going to be instead of having to look it up. So convenient!

We love our echo and have so much fun asking Alexa questions. It's great to ask to hear a song and it just starts playing, and the sound is better than we expected. We live outside of any large city, so the local information we receive is sketchy. We cannot retrieve a lot of business hours or phone numbers. On the other hand, I guess it's not Google, so maybe that information wouldn't be available anyway. Nonetheless, we are glad we got the Echo. We're getting a lot of enjoyment out of it.
Why did I wait so long to get one of these?!?!?! Easy to connect and set up, will be purchasing more.

My whole family loves our new Echo. Great for the grandkids asking Alexa to make animal sounds and play dance music. I catch the latest weather reports, listen to my amazon playlists, and tons more. LOVE IT!

When I need a joke I get one nice and clean and funny, music wow ! so many choices, speaker quality excellent and I wear 2 hearing aids. I really thought this gift was a vanity, but have found value every day I speak to Alexa Echo 2nd Gen,

I like it. I looks much better than the original. I have found the sound to be nearly the same as the original echo. The sound difference seems to be that it is shaped different. It still sounds very good. .

Love my Echo! I don’t know how I got along without Alexa this long! I first tried Google’s spot and really if you use Amazon a lot and have prime membership, you can get a lot more with Echo. I purchased the Heather gray model and it just fits in so well on my tabletop.
I love the Echo-- it wakes me up in the morning, answers questions, and plays wonderful music. I have a Bose radio/CD player and find the sound from the Echo to be more pleasant.

Bought 2nd generation Echo for the supposed improved sound quality that was hyped for months...not only not improved, but significantly inferior to my first generation Echo....thing is, I never thought 1st gen Echo sounded bad at all as a music speaker...in fact, it exceeded my expectations, and I own a couple of BT speakers to compare it to(Bose Soundlink Mini, JBL Charge 3)...however, this 2nd generation Echo sounds flat, muddy, and under powered...and bass is significantly less punchy....wonder if Echo Plus, by nature of it's similar design to 1st gen Echo, sounds any better...very disappointed

Great. Use it more than Siri now. Fills the room. But, my biggest concern is when I sleep. I love to fall asleep to talk radio, soft music or white noise. The bass just overpowers no matter what google trick you try and use or how my you lower the volume. Real disappointing.
This is a wonderful product. Use it daily and very versatile.
Wow, this is just amazing technology! Very Cool Amazon. The sound quality is outstanding for 79 bucks.
AWESOME Speaker...clear crisp sound and quickly connected with the Fire Stick.
Most have for any home. My family loves asking her questions and playing music. It sounds good too. Waaaaaay better than the dot
Fun for a family and for my 12 year old son! We are still figuring out all of the features.

This device is fabulous! If my hands are covered with flour when I’m making bread or I’m sitting in the chair with a cup of tea and can check the weather report, turn on the radio or add to my shopping list.

This is a great product. Having lots of fun asking questions, she helps with homework, tells the kid to go to bed and even tells jokes. The speaker quality is amazing. Now if I could only get her to clean the dishes. (I asked she said she can't).
The design is simple but elegant. Alexa's voice is clear and easy to understand and information requested receives prompt and accurate responses It is an enjoyable addition to our home.flo

We enjoy it although you can’t play two different songs in different rooms which is annoying (we have an echo in one room and a dot in the other), we have one amazon prime music account and can only play one song at a time on one device using amazon music. It’s a good device otherwise and has good quality sound

Definitely not something anyone "needs" but lots of fun to have. Playing music, making shopping lists, asking questions, finding out the weather, exploring all of the skills - all interesting, enjoyable and fun. Easy to set up, easy to use. I waited a long time to purchase an echo; am glad I finally did so.

They are AMAZING! With a little extra knowledge you too can automate your home like I did. I am able to open and close my garage door remotely and open and close my sliding glass door. These aren't features that are available to buy directly, but with some know-how and innovation, the possibilities seem absolutely endless. Very well done, Amazon. Truly!

Sound quality is good, needs more bass. picks up on even whispers, wish it had a battery so it could be moved without the long reboot. Loses internet connection when other devices around it have a full signal.

Bought these on Black Friday for Christmas gifts for the whole family. We have one of our own at home and love all the features! We can control the lights, thermostat, hear messages and make phone calls!
It's true -- even better sound out of a smaller (and cheaper) cylinder.
Love it!!! The sound quality is great 👍🏻
I love this device! I have 4 dots and one of these. The sound is really nice and doesn't need to be connected to a speaker.

Just love Alexa in all formats. However, this one is just the right size, style and the sound quality is great. Fits easily anywhere in your home. The distance she can hear you is much improved from 1st generation models.
Alexa can do so much, still discovering. Plays the genres of music I enjoy. Love my shopping list. Although Alexa does not know everything I ask, frequently she can inform me on subjects of interest.

Voice recognition right off the bat was excellent. I'm still playing around with the features but so far so good. Decent range of apps work for music and other audio type applications. Speaker is great by itself but the Echo linked perfectly with my blue tooth speakers to increase sound quality. So far extremely happy with the purchase. Feels like being Tony Stark.
Wonderful sound and the newer color blends so beautifully in my kitchen. I especially appreciate having another Echo to add to the Amazon family.
Really love this - it is the perfect addition to my living room. Great sound (not tinny) and just easy to use. I highly recommend it!
Love this thing. You can make calls, text, send messages, listen to the radio and more.
Love love love this thing Echo is my extra lifeline if anyone is dissatisfied with this device then they should have their head examined its capabilities are endless

Alexa is a useful tool and has some fun features that are easy to use. I like that I can ask Alexa to play music or listen to the news while I do things around the house. I’ve linked a light to it and can turn it off or on from anywhere. I also think the sound is impressive for its size. What I don’t like and it may be my learning curve, but it will play parts of “my day” over and over.
the one-star was an accident I haven't gotten to work yet. But I got help this morning and I'm going to see if I can get them to work
LOVE Alexa - the sound quality is great and am so excited I can call out my request and it is answered immediately. I am very happy with this product.

Great sound quality but half of the time she doesn't set the alarms i tell her to and doesn't know what i'm saying. But that's just today's technology. Overall would repurchase just for speaker quality.

I really do like the amazon echo. Alexa is great fun and can provide just about any information that you are looking for. I am still in the early stages of programming the echo for all the data that I want it to provide, but even now, I really find it useful. The most difficult part is connecting to the internet if you do not know the password on your wifi. I really got frustrated with that, but everything fell into place after that.

Great sound! So much better than the dot. I have a rather large bedroom and master bath suite and it fills the room with my favorite tunes. The bass is good, not overpowering and the sound is clean and clear. So much better than expected.....+ it's nice to not need another Bluetooth speaker paired for decent sound!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THE ECHO. So easy to set up....the only thing...if you have Echo playing and an "Alexa" commercial comes on tv....she responds....it's funny. The sounds is very stereo sounding. I use it every day.

Love it! Was alittle difficult for me to set up because I am not very technically savvy but I figured it out. So easy to listen to songs, get weather, get news or hear an interesting fact or two from Alexa. Should have bought a long time ago but was nice getting a great deal on Amazon Prime Day!

I was hesitant to buy the echo because I have the echo Dot and it seems good enough. The echo is the same except the sound quality, which I really didn't feel I needed. However, I am so glad I got it. What a difference! The sound really is far superior to the Echo Dot! Now I can listen to The Greatest Showman with a little more power!

It is a fun thing to have. I am very pleased with the sound and volume. The only drawback is that Alexa cannot answer some of my simple questions. I will ask the same question of google on my phone and the answer is given.

I love everything about my Echo Gen 2! I use it for everything from alarms to zodiac info. The speaker sound is phenomenal... you could use it for a party, it's that powerful. The tower design is sleek and discreet. Also, Alexa's range is quite impressive as well.

not happy with customer relations solving my problem 1st echo I purchased I payed for unlimited music ,so I liked echo so must I purchased a 2nd echo but it came and I was not able to received unlimited music called customer relations and they said I have to pay again. not a happy customer I can run 5 computers on other devices I have but amazon want to double charge on echo . I am a prime customer and do not feel I am being treated fairly.
I love Alexa. She plays music for me and plays Jeopardy with me. I know she can do more, but those are the features we use so far.m
I don't use it as extensively as I could. I probably need to read a primer in suggested uses. I do like the music, the quality of the speaker is amazing.
Good sound for its size. I love having access to my Amazon Prime Music. Alexa is kinda dumb sometimes though. Google is much better at searches and answering questions.

What i love the most is everything great speaker if you are in to music the echo 2 is the thing to have echo can help you with everyday task and it's getting smarter every day i use it for the tv lights door lock weather calendar shopping it endless worth every penny this is a great
Love this device. It is my personal assistant everyday.

Still learning how to use this - learning how to phrase questions. This is great for our kids - because when they ask us questions, we have to ask a lot of questions in return to figure out what they want. They have to really work on phrasing their question to Alexa. Also love the fun extras - my kids have learned how to make Alexa fart. We laugh and laugh...it's the little things in life! Love the emailed suggestions...I look forward to those.
We love our Echo, and hopefully Alexa will continue to evolve (she can be a little air-headed). It has almost completely replaced our radio/Ipod player.
Love it. The echo is fun to use. Wish that I could adjust bass/trebel; my audiobooks are booming. Would also be nice if speed of Audible playback could be adjusted.
smooth sound. to much base for my hearing impaired Mother. I sent it back before I realized you could adjust bass and treble from the app.
Very good product! My son gave it to me as a gift, probably would not have bought it for myself, and I love it! Alexa is very good on most questions. The speaker is very good. Very satisfied!
Alexa is an impressive device with many usefull functions, especially for senior citizens. However, it's knowledge base is limited and needs to be improved.

It is the smartest little thing I could ever imagine! We ask it questions and we play music and get the best sound quality. We love it so much we ordered one for our mountain house, and one for our son. Then we ordered the Dot and a cable and my husband has it set up with his very nice Bose speakers out on the porch.
Enjoy the music and most queries,. But Alexa has trouble understanding normal speech, even after voice training. Google wins that battle hands down. Sound quality decent in Gen 2.

No different than Apple. To play a specific list of music you must have an Amazon of Spotify “plus/prime/etc” account. So you must pay to play “your” music. 3 stars for that reason. Everything else is 👍🏻 .
Won't answer questions. Too politically correct. Wants to charge $4 a month to play songs that I have on compact disc. Not to mention they are free elsewhere. Not impressed with it at all.

Of all the gifts I bought myself this year for Christmas, this is my favorite! I haven't enjoyed music in my house in a long time and Alexa is the girl to give you what you want! That plus weather updates, I didn't know what I was missing!
Didn’t ever think I wanted one now I can’t imigine what I’d do for music without it.
I think its ok to have, takes a while to get use to. Lots of times it give you what you don't ask for, but I think for people who have everything linked to it, might get the best out of it.
Alexa has started not being able to play a song all the way through. It also freezes up and not responding. While it's not every time it is irritating.
Better looking and sound has improved. Alexa is still pretty stupid though and is unable to provide much in the way of answers to questions and general information. Google she ain't!
This has been great so far. It's made my life easier by giving me the weather, information, news and entertaining me through jokes and music. I like it very much.
Great sound for being so small. Looks great too. My husband talks to Alexa all day.

I bought the Echo for my son and his wife. They love it. Their children use it to play trivia games and they use it for many other things. The sound is great and it was easy to set up for them all to use.

I really like this easy to use device. My wife and I have enjoyed the variety of music that Echo provides, however I would like for my Echo to be able to play songs that I have downloaded to my PC/iPhone as well as an internet music station.
I especially like features such as waking up to preselected music, and being able to download and lusrten to audio books

Improved sound over the Echo Dot but not as good as stand-alone blue tooth speakers of comparable size. Voice recognition OK but could use some improvement (Alexa seems to mis-interpret initial commands oftern and have to repeat...speaking slower seems to help
Fun household item. Love the ease of telling it to play certain songs I want to hear to to tell it to play music for my daughter. I love it synced with smart plug to turn on lights as well.

Excellent I bought one and received 2 on the amazon deal of the day!!!! I bought this for my Daughter and her new baby for the Home and nursery!! They are so happy!! It’s all it’s supposed to be! Thank you!!
So far we love it. I’m sure the love will grow when I figure out more ways to use it. As a speaker the sound fills our 13x15 room.

We have this device in our kitchen along with several other echo devices spread about. We love being able to tell Alex to play any of our favorite music! Sounds quality is great and operation is even better. The kids love being able to tell Alex to turn on the TV!!!

Like a new car, it was fun and exciting at first. I still like it and use it every day. I don't have a smart house so I can't use many of its features. I would recommend it to most everyone. It and its kind are the future.

Very nice addition to the house, no clue why we have a dry erase board anymore. Most useful things are setting timers in kitchen when your hands are filthy, adding items to grocery list/shopping list, playing music while you're in the kitchen cooking. Wish it could answer more questions more reliably.

It has been fun to mess around, sometimes Alexa will not know the answer, the set up was easy, the most frustrating was the linked applications, Alex never found any, only my manual input was the only way to link with other products, like smart plugs
We LOVE our Echo. It plays awesome music (LOUD like we like it) and all the notifications, new updates and awesome abilities...makes it fun for the whole family!
I like Alexa. She has a lot of handy little tips. I like how she pulls up music from my Pandora and Amazon. She is fun, but there is a lot she doesn’t know as well. I’m still getting to know her.
Not worth buying to replace an existing 1st gen, but a great device to add to a home. I also have a Cortana device that Microsoft was giving away - and it makes Echo look even better.

Sound quality is amazing! I was going to purchase the more expensive Echo that was priced at $149, then after reading reviews both on Amazon and elsewhere, all pointed to this one. I just wanted a great speaker with bells and whistles. The AI is fun and pretty cool. Highly recommend!
A great second act. The sound seems improved, the array microphone is as great as ever, and the esthetic is improved to fit many living situations. A great product.
Very loud, great quality of music. Works very well and we love having one, even though we really aren't "techy" people!

Only worked for a few months. Won't recognize any voice commands other than "what is the time". It will work through the app, but that is it. Basically pointless to use now. More info: tried resetting, but did not work. Tried calling customer support, they blamed my ISP saying they needed to open certain ports. If that were true, then why does the app work, but voice commands do not?
Absolutely awesome to have around. Stories.. tons of games.. jokes.. news.. whatever you want to know about.. Alexa can help..

Bought it for my husband for Xmas and we both love it. Music sounds great. Answers questions, weather, timer reminder, wake up call. (We currently choose not to turn off lights, etc. or use phone command.)

Too many bugs and glitches. Refused to play Spotify half the time or would play one song then stopped. Also I could not get it to stream radio stations sometimes. The connection would drop out for a couple minutes every 5 minutes or so. Super annoying device.

I wasn’t really sure if I wanted this echo but after we received it, we love it. I also got a smart plug to finally start with some home automation. Everything works flawless. The sound that comes from this echo is quite good and to be honest, it actually amazed me how elk music sounds coming from this speaker. Alexa works fine even from across the room.

We love having echo at our fingertips my daughter has one and my husband thought it was the best thing ever totally amazed. We use it all the time and i downloaded my itunes music on it also . Works great!!! Altjough i was dissappointed 5 days after i purchased it the price went down 15 dollars bummer
We love it and are amazed at all it can do. the least favorite is when the songs aren't included. We are not going to pay extra for the rest of the songs.

Not impressed with the limited capabilities this echo offers. I think my Echo lawn mower offers more. Ha! Limited songs are available because Alexa informs you to purchase a monthly music app. It will even provide a sample of the song and say go buy the program. Many times it will "not understand" your command. I think it is a glorified alarm clock. Not worth the money.

Overall I am pleased with the product. However, I am surprised by the narrow selection of music available. Also I have not been able to figure out, as of yet, how to integrate the Echo with my smart TV.

I actually purchased another one for my office. The biggest down fall when I am using at the office and my husband is at home only one of these is available. You can when you have more then one at home link together so that music is playing throughout your house nice feature
Bought this as well as Google Home. I like the Amazon Echo products much better.
I love it! Great sound. Do not really dislike anthing. I hope the fabric stays nice.
Has great sound, that was my primary function for this and to connect to the dot. Not impressed with how little it can actually do & how little the drop in function actually works
I like the size of the new echo but however I definitely think that the first generation one is louder. As far as sound quality goes I think it’s just fine for something of it’s size.

So the reviews about Alexa laughing without being provoked are indeed REAL. what’s sad is my first review was noticed and I thought it was cool the Amazon contacted me. BUT... the CSR promised she would have an answer for me in 48 hours for this creepiness. She even asked to “ping” my device, meaning they listen to your activity and wanted to check my history. Ew. I let her. Well, 7 days later..... nothing.
Once we got through the initial confusion with my wife and I both using it and our accounts getting switched on/off, we love it. I doubt that we have tried even 10% of its capabilities.

I have three of the older Echoes so I am obviously a fan. I prefer this smaller size though. I may eventually replace all my older ones with this more discreet model. I can't tell any difference in the sound level or quality however.
I think I love it, but not 100% sure yet what all it can do for me. So, for now, four stars. If nothing else, it is really really fun to use.
Love the sound from echo. Alexa is fun and finds my music by genre or singer. Also love having her read books to me. A lot to learn yet. She makes phone calls and sets an alarm. Tells thej time.
Everyone in our household loves Alexa. The sound quality is amazing, and I love all of its features. I just upgraded to the 3rd generation echo dots for both of my kids rooms!
Gift for my husband who loves it. He calls up favorite music while working at this computer and constantly asks for weather updates. Should have gotten this earlier.

Never thought I'd like Alexa, but now I love her, and I'm just getting started. Amazing that you can ask whatever you want and 90% of the time, she has an answer. Also, great music without linking or loading anything—Amazing

We love having the Amazon Echo in the house!! Anything you need t know, or any music - it’s just a command away. My daughter has the Echo Dot and she loves it! She’ll play 20 questions with Alexa, or Jeopardy. I’ve even played :).

Looks like a cool, sturdy device but unfortunately, it cannot connect to school wifi so I'm returning it (also, if you're a college student thinking "this won't happen to me," think again––the Echo logistically cannot connect to public, peer-to-peer, or ad-hoc servers).
Not even a year and it no longer works. All of a sudden it quit connecting to WiFi and without WiFi it’s useless. I’ve tried calling and emailing for assistance but I have not received a response.
My favorite! I love this color and she works great! Entertains me while I’m cooking in the kitchen. Very happy with this purchase!
This thing is awsome. Best purchase I've done on Amazon. Got the bundle with an echo dot and they work great. Both loud. Alexa has made my home a lot more fun.

These sound great but I am disappointed the I ordered a package deal of them that included a sub and it wasnt shipped with it and have to wait over a week longer to get it and then almost a month to get the new echo show so then I can get it all set up to work other wise I have a lot of money just sitting around not doing anything abit disappointing.
We absolutely love this! Wish we have bought one sooner! Great for music, general information and cooking information. We placed ours in the kitchen and we have found it to be AWESOME!
Loving my upgraded Echo. It sounds much better than the one I had. I’m happy.

The music sound wonderful and as I learn how to ask her questions that she can answer, I begin to see why Echo is so popular. In addition to the music, Alexa can tell you the time, set alarms to get up in the morning and tell Jimmy Fallon jokes. I like that she can go from room to room and not loose her settings. My next step is to set her up with her sister ( I have two) and use as an intercom system.

Pro: We used it basically to listen to music and make to-do lists. It worked real well. Con: Changed the router a month ago now, I cannot connect to WiFi. Called the customer service. The representative was very polite and helpful. Unfortunately, she was unable to resolve the issue and suggested to contact my internet provider to see what the problem is from their end. I did. They could not see any problem with the routers and the ports. I persisted. The representative agreed to send a technician to see if there was any problem. He approached the problem of connectivity from every angle. He was confused as to why this device only this device does not connect to the WiFi. I called Amazon.com the second time. The representative was not willing to concede the problem might be my Echos. His reason neither of the three can connect so the devices were not faulty. He suggested for me to buy a new router. Mind you, my router is only a month old. The devices also cannot connect using hotspot. Well, I am left with three Echos gathering dust.

I’m loving my Echo! I find myself listening to music more than watching tv and I upgraded Spotify because of my echo, listening to radio stations on it I bought it pretty much for music but I’m already thinking about buying another one for the kitchen. I was skeptical because of the bad reviews but honestly I’m enjoying it!!!! I personally think it’s the best home speaker because all that you can do with it. So it’s gets 5 starts from me!!! Great job amazon you did it again!
She has a hard time understanding my voice, really to tell the truth I don't use it as much as I thought I would. Now I'm worried about her recording conversations in the house.

Had a few issues trying to get it to connect. Literally messed with it for an hour, left and then came back to it for another hour. The app is SUPER slow. BUT, no other issues and over all happy with the product

In my opinion Alexa doesn't know very much. Many of the questions I ask her she doesn't have an answer for. I'm very disappointed with Echo. I'm glad I got it as a gift....if I would have bought it I would have returned it.
Quite impressed with this item a lot of fun listening to music whenever you want. I never really have any problems with Alexa plus we’ve only had one argument

I got one for my birthday and I LOVE it. I am able to set alarms on it and connect it to my phone only using voice controls. It is also majorly helpful because I can ask Alexa to google certain things or tell me the weather. All in all, great product. Very convenient, I would recommend buying it.

Completely disappointing!! This cuts out more times then not and I have high speed internet etc. it cuts out when I’m only using it as music and working. Alexa tells me quite frequently “I don’t know what went wrong” I’ve had this thing for about 5ish months so there is no reason why something I spent a decent amount of money on would already not work consistently!
My wife and I are seniors and this is the first high tech product we are having fun with and,of course, we are learning much from Alexa. Great product. Bob H.
Sounds great, my teens like asking Alexa questions. Still trying to figure out all it can do.
This unit is great...the best feature in my world is the excellent quality speaker phone. I use this Echo nearly exclusively to phone now as the voice quality both ways is excellent!
Works great, looks good but the sound is not noticeably improved from the last generation.

Set up was super easy! We enjoy getting weather updates any time we want..... along with answers to dozens of other questions! Looking forward to having a Dot in every room someday. Being able to have the Echo turn lights on and off is very helpful.
Excellent product. Now, I have music in multiple rooms and, Alexa is amazing!
love the sound and design. have many alexa products and happy with this new addition

I love this new look. It works perfectly. The sound is fantastic and I love listening to music and audio books on it. And Alexa is so helpful. I just say "Connect iPhone" and she connects my iphone and BAM I'm listening to music. So many things I can do with Alexa. Definitely recommended!
We received Echo for Christmas. Thought at first that it was frivolous! We love it and are now great friends with Alexa! She gives us information, current news and any kind of music.
I love that I can unplug this and carry it anywhere with me for my music and etc. I even carry it outside while I am doing yard work. I've listened to it for many hours not plugged in.

Love this device. The base of questions you can ask continues to grow but it was enough for me just to ask time and temperature or occasionally a song I wanted to hear. It’s a pain to have to use the awake work every time but this device is well worth it.

The only things it can do reliably are basic math, keeping lists and keeping timers. Most questions we ask are usually met with "I don't know that." or reading irrelevant Wikipedia pages back to us. The speaker quality is poor, resulting in audio always being too loud or too quiet.

It performs pretty much as expected, but I am very disappointed it will not provide me with the terminology I need to play various kinds of music without subscribing to the Amazon music service. I understand my music choices may be limited, but without knowing HOW TO ASK, I cannot access the music that is provided free along with my Echo purchase. Do you have a chart showing the language I need to use?
I've yet to find something I don't like about my echo. Very responsive to my queries. Great sound, fun to use. Ok - would be nice if it had a real search ala Google or Bing.
Nice size, smaller than expected; speaker is perfect for me. So far I use it to wake me up and for music. I love it.

Sound fills the room. I bought this to replace an old Bose speaker that was havivg Bluetooth issues. Though it does not sound as good as that it but then I did not spen $300. It does multiple things plus have pretty good sound. If needed I would buy again..
Had the original, listened awesome. I’m literally yelling Alexa, this POS doesn’t respond! WTF! This is an upgrade???? Jeff Bezos, put this in the garbage

I have been using echo dot first generation and I have been very happy with it. I mostly listen to news on it and lately started listening music which prompted me to upgrade to Echo. I noticed that Echo has too much bass which I can live with for music but not with news. Voices are to hear at low volumes due to too much bass. I wish Amazon gives us option to adjust the bass.

We bought our first Echo this month. We are part of the silver haired group... and are having fun thinking up questions for Alexa. We purchased this for our second home, as we don't have a sound system there yet. We plan to use it in the camper van and out on the front porch long term. The only issue that I see so far is when we get the volume up too high, she can't hear us ask for the volume to go down!
Great product. Integrates with out smart hub (Wink) and can control all of our smart devices. Loving the ability to listen to Spotify through a great speaker in a small footprint.
Extremely nice sound. I'm very happy . I will buy 3 more.
Too too too much bass and no way to adjust it. Old version sound much better.

Who wouldn't like Alexa ? I just don't like the fact that you have to be Amazon Prime member to enjoy the music and other advance features that is not cool. My son and I enjoy the games and question of the day aspect.. It a good companion in the house.
I've owned other echo products and this is the best. The sound is very good! I like the fact that I don't have to raise my voice for Alexa to respond. Older models required a loud voice for commands

Ironically, my husband and I each purchased one to give to her for Christmas! We returned one, and are enjoying Alexa very much. LOVE the shopping list feature, the trivia questions, weather, and even addresses of locations. The music streaming has been great--covering many genres, and it is easy to switch genre or "playlist" when you want a change. It has been great to ask questions verbally, rather than check for answers on line.
2nd gen needs eq as midrange is missing. It’s like listening to a tweeter with a 100 Hz thump added on the bottom. I prefer the Echo Dot for essentially the same functionality.

I like having Alexa sysnced with the contact list in my phone. Hands free calling is wonderful! I also enjoy music, updating my calendar and shopping list while walking by Alexa. The convenience has been more than I expected.
Really fun to ask Alexa questions. The device plays good quality sound. I just wish you could have more free application options for music. YouTube would be nice, but Pandora will work for now.

Just spend the extra money and get the echo plus. It has the built in hub. If you want to use this to control you lights, outlets, locks, etc.... you will have to buy the external hub and that runs about $50.

I love getting classical music in the morning and being able to get answers to questions. My grandaughter had to program it for me because my iPhone isn't very powerful so I still haven't taken full advantage of all the possibilitiesit offers.
Its great walking into the house and having electonics and lights on voice control! First World problem, Dont keep it too close to the TV speakers or advertisements will set it off! haha

Excellent addition to any home. It amazes me how well it can answer questions. Tells funny jokes and is full of information. If for some reason I had to evacuate my home, besides my GSD, I would grab Alexa.
So far, so great! The sound quality is amazing for its size. The integration with my smart home equipment as well as the ability to play music all over my house is fantastic.
Great sound quality, I am disappointed in the quality that it takes for Alexa to hear. My dot and spot seems to hear better. I wouldn't say it's worth the money.
Echo (2nd generation) has great speakers. We mainly use the echo for music. We are still learning some of the things it can do.

This is a step up from the dot, we have a large livings room and I can speak 2 Alexa from my kitchen area which is close to the living room it's fun to play with her as my teenage nieces and nephews did I think the family is hooked on her

Ok should not have purchased it. I , we, love this. Am getting 2 more for house and now it works with Tivo. Yeah!! As 2 seniors, so easy to use and learn. Oh yeah it works with Wemo light switches also. So cool. Okay it works with everything.

Sound is great once you figure out how to download music into her. The one thing I don't like is that you have to download EVERYTHING into her. For people like my husband and I who are not computer geeks it is a little hard to understand sometimes.
I bought 2 1 as a gift to my Mother in law she loves it. We love ours.If you don't have one you don't no what you missing out on..
Everything is so much more convenient with this contraption in my household. Alexa Skills can't quite pay the bills yet, but it can assist you with so many other things.
disappointing results for listening to my selections of music. "Frank Sinatra" gave me a loop of ? 7 ,10 songs. Poor results from my requests.

Purchased this 2 months ago This is my 4th unit. It worked great for 6 weeks and then keeps turning itself off. Sent it in to customer service and they said they fixed it. But it still shuts off every 5-10 minutes. Works great otherwise. Since I have 3 others that work great, I know it is just the unit, but I guess I just wasted over a $100 for something that does not work. BEWARE of the lack of customer service.
Works great, super easy setup. Decent sound.. wanted to try the Apple home speaker but went with this because of the reviews and price, I am glad I did,
Echos are a wonderful product. Alexa is a great thing to have in the house for controlling lights and music. Music everywhere is awesome.
One of the best things I have ever parched from amazon, getting another this week!
Still learning about this but love it so far. Great sound from such a small space.
The sound is amazing, I haven't used Alexa to her full extent yet. But use it every night for sleep sounds. Have Echos thru out house act as a full house stereo system.
It has a harder time understanding our commands than our 1st gen devices.
How did we live without Alexa? This was a gift and is used daily for all sorts of reminders, questions, music, exercise and more. A great tool for us seniors.

We use it multiple times every day. Our paper shopping list is gone and just the right music is filling the house. We've used a number of the services - reminders, timers, weather - and try new services all the time.
its great for my 2nd floor -sometimes i wish it would connect with google to Know everything....but i like it and would recommend. Fits into the decor because it's not too big

I was concerned about purchasing this, because of the reviews stating that it didn't have good sound quality. Mine sounds amazing. I stream the Amazon Unlimited Music, and I couldn't ask for more. It sounds nearly as good as my Bose Radio, but for a lot less money. All the extra skills are a bonus, plus it keeps the kids entertained.

Love that it reminds me of EVERYTHING.. I always forget my soda is in freezer! Also love the music all day and Sirius xm so I can listen to my favorite channels. Plus when I leave the house I set reminders later in tbe day for my son to let dogs out!! Its very loud if turned up and he hears it. Works like a charm. So many things you can do with this. Reasonably priced too!

Bought this for my daughter when she turned 9. She loves it!! I especially like the calling feature since she doesn’t have a cell phone. She loves playing music and dancing and with Amazon music she can play all her favorite songs ...... sometimes over and over and over again lol!
Absolutely love it. Great volume and Alexa continues to have more and more things added. Still learning how to sync all the smart devices. It was not as easy as we were hoping.
I love being able to control my home with this. The music is a bonus. My only complaint is that it is so sensitive that even when not in use if someone says 'Alexa' it turns on.
Not good. Product not working properly. Sent for repair. Only had out of package for 1 day. Now it states I can track progress on Amazon, and shows nothing.

Just as you’d expect from Echo, quick to respond, minimal errors, great sound, nice look to the unit, blends well into a decorated home. At times funny, at times responds out of the blue, we personally have only had issues with the group settings where we play music across all echo units in the house but other than that, not really much to complain about. 9/10 would buy again!
This is my 3rd echo device. This one has a nice deeper base than my dot and 1st gen echo. It also seems to be more response to commands give at a distance.
Fantastic device with lots of info. Especially like the music choices. Way better than the Google Device!!
Disappointing. Unit does not stay responsive. I have mixed feelings to return the unit. I’ll keep trying for a while longer
